original_title: My Morning Jacket Live at Red Rocks
overview: My Morning Jacket was back at Red Rocks Amphitheatre in Morrison, CO on Saturday, August 3rd for the second of two shows at the outdoor amphitheater following a nearly 17-month hiatus. Following night one on Friday, the band returned with a setlist filled with music from throughout their career as the rock band continues its very brief run of select 2019 performances.
title: My Morning Jacket Live at Red Rocks
